overview: Güney's marriage proposal to Derya drives Salih crazy and Derya is grounded. Sadri fires  his gun to scare Güney who will realize he has no choice but to abduct Derya and marry her secretly. When Seda learns about all these and that Güney's father is the one who killed Derya's father, she immediately goes after Güney. Seda shows the video to Güney and Sadri shows it to Derya.
title: Come Together, Now!
